reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an exceptional professor. Her lectures are engaging and she provides great support outside of class.

reviews.subject: Mathematics for Engineers
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable, though his explanations can be a bit dense at times.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: The course was interesting, but Dr. Williams's teaching style could be more interactive.

reviews.subject: Advanced Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are hard to follow, and he often seems disorganized.

reviews.subject: Ethics in Technology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is fantastic. Her class discussions are thought-provoking and she is always open to questions.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson has a clear passion for the subject and provides detailed explanations.

reviews.subject: History of Art
reviews.review: Dr. Miller makes art history come alive. Her lectures are full of passion and insight.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Moore is knowledgeable, but the course material is difficult to grasp and could use more examples.

reviews.subject: Principles of Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor explains complex economic theories in a simple and understandable way.

reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is an excellent instructor. His practical examples make learning data structures easy.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas brings a lot of enthusiasm to her literature classes, making them enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Digital Signal Processing
reviews.review: Dr. Jackson's lectures are okay, but the course could benefit from more hands-on projects.

reviews.subject: Intro to Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. White is incredibly engaging and her class discussions are very enlightening.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is a solid instructor, though sometimes the pace of the class is a bit fast.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is fantastic. Her detailed explanations and hands-on approach make learning anatomy easy.

reviews.subject: Financial Accounting
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is competent, but his teaching style is a bit dry and could use more real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Science
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson has a deep understanding of philosophy and makes the subject very interesting.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is excellent. Her explanations are clear and she provides lots of practice problems.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is passionate about the environment and his lectures are very informative.

reviews.subject: Computer Networks
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is knowledgeable, but the course content is quite challenging and could use better organization.
